objective: Seeking a Senior Full-stack Developer role to apply 4+ years of experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and modern technologies.
Ready to contribute to large-scale projects and grow into more advanced software development positions.

education.institution: University of Information Technology - Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City

responsibilities: Worked with HTML, CSS, JavaScript to build and style web pages.
Learned back-end basics with Node.js, Express.js, and databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
Assisted in building RESTful APIs and practiced unit/integration testing.
Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
Experienced in building and developing RESTful APIs, working with Node.js, ReactJS, NestJS, and relational databases such as PostgreSQL and SQL Server.
Skilled in applying modern architectures, including Back-end for Front-end (BFF) and Micro Front-end Architecture.
Hands-on experience with development and operation tools such as Git, Docker, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, Vercel,...
Strong adaptability to business environments and effective collaboration within cross-functional teams.

projects.name: MIG-25
description: Migrate the websites of key organizations in a Southeast Asian country from legacy systems to modern platforms.
responsibilities: Communicate with the BA to clarify the requirements before implementing the features.
Develop new screens based on the design and functionality of legacy screens.
Write unit tests and fix front-end bugs.
Collaborate with back-end developers and testers to integrate and validate website functionality.

projects.name: UniCode
description: Develop a Chrome Extension to manually configure and inject custom content into FPT's internal web pages.
Develop a Chrome Extension to manage tools, tasks, notifications, and documents for FPT employees.
responsibilities: Communicate with the BA to clarify the requirements before implementing the features.
Develop new features based on the design and requirements.
Write unit tests and fix front-end bugs.
Collaborate with back-end developers and testers to integrate and validate functionality.

projects.name: Develop & Grow with Browser Compatibility
description: Migrate the Human Resource Management System of a Korean economic enterprise from legacy technologies to a modern platform using JavaScript libraries, ensuring cross-browser compatibility on Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge.
responsibilities: Lead migration of a legacy HR management system to a modern JavaScript stack.
Define front-end architecture, coding standards, and best practices for scalability and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborate with testers, QA, and stakeholders to align technical solutions with business needs.
Mentor team members through code reviews, technical discussions, and knowledge sharing.
Ensure performance optimization, accessibility compliance, and smooth deployment.

projects.name: Global Invoicing - MVP
description: Migrate a legacy desktop application for a Japanese client to a modern web application focusing on invoice and document management.
Integrate the Work Invoice project as a core module of the system to handle invoice and document processes efficiently.
responsibilities: Participate in building UI for new screens.
Unit test, Integration test.
Create documentation for end users.
Fix and analyze UI bugs.
Create a tool based on micro front-end architecture to increase project development productivity.
Combine with other projects to deploy using a monorepo approach.
projects.technologies: ReactJS (TypeScript), Atomic Design, Context API, Redux, Git, Monorepo with Lerna & pnpm workspace

projects.name: Work Invoice
description: Develop and enhance features for a Japanese client's system handling the import and export of tickets and invoices.
responsibilities: Create detailed designs.
Participate in building new screens.
Build a Visual Studio Code extension that generates detailed designs from source code.
projects.technologies: ReactJS (TypeScript), Atomic Design, Context API, Redux, Git.

projects.name: TransWorld
description: Refactor the back-end source code of a goods import-export project for a Japanese client, ensuring alignment with the basic design specifications provided by the customer.
responsibilities: Implement new APIs.
Unit test, Integration test.
Create report documents.
Fix and analyze bugs.

projects.name: Jupiter
description: Migrate a legacy desktop application in the financial domain for a Japanese client to a modern web application.
responsibilities: Fix and analyze UI bugs.
Create reporting documents for customers.
Participate in building new features for the system.

technical: Tools: Docker, Git, Postman, SVN, Jira.
skills.soft: Effective teamwork, good communication, good presentation.
